description: WELCOME TO MAPLE LANEâ€”a quiet end-unit townhome that feels like a house and only a quick stroll to the best of North Van living. Located on a quiet tree-lined street, this elegant home offers 3 beds up, a primary ensuite, & many home like qualities. The basement boasts a truly adaptable room that could serve as garage like storage, media room or a home office. 2 covered & secured parking directly at your door - ideal for a busy family. Features include large principle rooms, hardwood floors, s/s appliances, gas fireplace, stone counters, abundance of outdoor space & storage. Enjoy easy indoor/outdoor living with a sunny south-facing patio & a private back patio surrounded by lush green space. Steps to Lonsdale shops, parks, schools & public transit. North Van Living at its finest!
